All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BlockUtility
Utility class for block operations on files (recover blocks from a corrupted file).
Buffer
The Buffer class represents a write buffer for the Write-Ahead Logging (WAL) file.
BufferException
The BufferException class represents an exception that is thrown when a buffer operation fails.
ByteUtility
A utility class for working with byte arrays and conversions.
CompactionState
The CompactionState class represents the state of compaction in a storage engine.
Config
Configuration class (see Config) for managing database settings.
ConfigException
This exception is thrown when there is an error in the configuration.
ExcessValueSizeException
This exception is thrown when the size of a value exceeds the allowed limit.
IncoherentDataException
This exception is thrown when there is incoherent or inconsistent data encountered.
IndexMap
The IndexMap interface defines the contract for a map-like data structure that stores key/index mappings.
IndexMapImpl
An implementation of the IndexMap interface.
RandomAccessFileFactory
A factory for creating and managing instances of RandomAccessFileWrapper.
RandomAccessFilePool
A pool implementation for managing instances of RandomAccessFileWrapper.
RandomAccessFileWrapper
A wrapper class that extends RandomAccessFile and provides additional functionality.
RecordConsumer
The RecordConsumer interface provides a method for accepting records.
RecordUtility
Utility class for working with records (addressing computations) in a storage system.
RetainedKeyException
The RetainedKeyException class is an unchecked exception that indicates a retained key.
StorageDB
The StorageDB class represents a key-value storage database (that stores data in a database file).
StorageDBBuilder
The builder class for creating a StorageDB instance with custom configuration.
StorageDBException
The StorageDBException class is the base exception class for all exceptions related to the StorageDB system.
StorageDBRuntimeException
The StorageDBRuntimeException class represents a runtime exception specific to the StorageDB library.
